Products & Technology

Meeting unmet patient needs

Altanine addresses global medical needs with innovative science, enhancing Metformin delivery for affordable access to advanced therapies for millions worldwide.

Products

Our products include different configurations and formulations of Metformin.

Crystalized Metformin

Our effervescent version of Metformin provides a sachet of Metformin crystals that, when mixed with water, provides a drinkable solution for taking Metformin. The Metformin crystals come in different flavor options.

Metformin Gummies

Our gummy version of Metformin is as simple as if one were eating a gummy candy. The gummies are infused with Metformin and provide an easier option for patients who struggle with swallowing pills or related side effects.

Enhancements

In addition to our base versions of Crystalized Metformin and Metformin Gummies.

We offer enhancements for patients with specific needs and requirements.

We offer a Metformin + Vitamin B12 product

Because patients who take Metformin over extended periods of time show Vitamin B12 deficiencies, we offer a Metformin + Vitamin B12 product

Enhancements

Additionally, and perhaps of much greater interest, is that most diabetics are overweight. Studies have shown that when Metformin is combined with liraglutide, diabetic patients lose weight and show other improvements

As a result:

We offer a Metformin Gummy with Liraglutide designed to address weight-loss and glucose levels simultaneously.

Beyond Diabetes

We also need to recognize that Metformin has applications beyond the diabetes world.

Due to its anti-inflammatory properties, Metformin has become widely regarded as an “anti aging” treatment

As a result, our products can be used for anti-aging applications as well as other diseases where Metformin is a commonly prescribed treatment.

All of our products are manufactured by a licensed compounding pharmacy.

Patients must send a doctor-issued prescription to the compounding pharmacy in order to receive our products.

beyond Diabetes

Altanine therapies beyond Diabetes

01

Anti-aging tretment

Due to its anti-inflammatory properties, Metformin may also mitigate age-related diseases, extend lifespan and increase health span.

02

Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)

Metformin is a beneficial ovulation induction agent for non-obese PCOS women, with advantages over other initial treatments. It is an effective step for women resistant to clomiphene in treating anovulatory infertility.

03

Weight loss therapy

Altanine’s technology can be applied to liraglutide, a powerful weight loss drug. Altanine can provide liraglutide in a gummy or crystal form avoiding injections and GI side effects.

IP protections filed under
PCT/US2023/081775
*Altanine is considering new regulatory filings to broaden its sales, including orphan drug designation for Metformin in treating specific non-diabetic conditions, generic drug designation for Metformin gummies, and medical device designation for future Metformin-related applications.

Metformin License

Our Intellectual property

Altanine has an exclusive, worldwide license for the enteric coating for Metformin (including Metformin and Liraglutide combinations)

  • Metformin & Liraglutide are generic drugs previously approved by the US Food & Drug Administration (FDA)
  • Altanine can sell its products throughout the US using 503A and 503B compounding pharmacies to fill prescriptions
  • Regulatory & IP have been vetted by GreenbergTraurig
